CustomField.formula: IF ( Days_To_Expiration__c >= 90, IMAGE( "/resource/1533822580000/Green_Light_Image" , "Green" ), IF ( Days_To_Expiration__c <= 0, IMAGE( "/resource/1533822809000/Red_Light_Image" , "Red" ), IMAGE("/resource/1533822848000/Yellow_Light_Image", "Yellow") ) )
CustomField.label: Expiration Status
